title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-3.9 - Posting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-3.9 - Posting

State Regulations

Every employer covered by this Part shall post in a
conspicuous place in his establishment, a notice issued by the Department of

Labor summarizing minimum wage provisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
142-3.9

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
